en: Welcome to CodeTap, the place where experts share their life stories so you can jumpstart your Web Developer career taking shortcuts to success.
Starters get to build websites from day one and learn how to on the job.
ro: Bine ai venit la CodeTap, locul unde experții își împărtășesc experiența ca tu să-ți poți lansa cariera de Dezvoltator Web folosind scurtături.
Începătorii vor construi website-uri din prima zi învățând cum din mers.

en: CodeTap offers courses for FREE on YouTube. All you need is a connection to the internet, access to a computer or latop and basic English so you can communicate with others.

A strong will and determination will be your best friend along the way. If a pain brought you here, like: you're sick of a boring job, you get paid not enough or you don't see a brighter future for you or your loved ones, use this to fuel your oddysey to a Web Developer.
CodeTap made it easy for you. All you have to do is pay a visit to our CodeTap channel on YouTube by visiting CodeTap YouTube Channel
